sourcesContent:
<template>
  <van-stepper
    v-model="stepperValue"
    :min="min"
    :max="max"
    :step="step"
    :integer="integer"
    :disabled="disabled"
    :disable-input="disableInput"
    :async-change="asyncChange"
    :input-width="inputWidth"
    @change="onChange"
    @overlimit="onOverlimit"
    @plus="onPlus"
    @minus="onMinus"
    @focus="onFoucs"
    @blur="onBlur"
  ></van-stepper>
</template>

<script>
import { Stepper } from 'vant';

export default {
  name: 'Stepper',
  components: {
    [Stepper.name]: Stepper
  },
  model: {
    prop: 'value',
    event: 'changeValue'
  },
  props: {
    min: {
      type: [String, Number],
      default: 1
    },
    max: [String, Number],
    step: {
      type: [String, Number],
      default: 1
    },
    integer: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    disabled: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    disableInput: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    asyncChange: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    value: {
      type: [Number, String],
      default: 1
    },
    inputWidth: {
      type: String,
      default: '30px'
    }
  },
  data () {
    return {
      stepperValue: 1
    };
  },
  methods: {
    onChange (value) {
      this.$emit('change', value);
      this.$emit('changeValue', value);
    },
    onOverlimit () {
      this.$emit('overlimit');
    },
    onPlus () {
      this.$emit('plus');
    },
    onMinus () {
      this.$emit('minus');
    },
    onFoucs () {
      this.$emit('focus');
    },
    onBlur () {
      this.$emit('blur');
    }
  },
  created () {
    this.stepperValue = this.value;
  }
};
</script>
